mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_re_deployment ( ID_, NAME_, CATEGORY_, KEY_, TENANT_ID_, DEPLOY_TIME_, ENGINE_VERSION_ ) VALUES( #{id}, #{name}, #{category}, #{key}, #{tenantId}, #{deployTime}, #{engineVersion} )

INSERT INTO act_re_deployment ( ID_, NAME_, CATEGORY_, KEY_, TENANT_ID_, DEPLOY_TIME_, ENGINE_VERSION_ ) VALUES
( #{id}, #{name}, #{category}, #{key}, #{tenantId}, #{deployTime}, #{engineVersion} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID_, NAME_, CATEGORY_, KEY_, TENANT_ID_, DEPLOY_TIME_, ENGINE_VERSION_ FROM act_re_deployment where ID_ =#{id}
